plot: Six men and six women who are unhappy with their lives arrive at an exclusive tropical resort to "reboot". They learn that they must compete against each other to hold onto this newly-found slice of paradise.
plot_en: Six men and six women who are unhappy with their lives arrive at an exclusive tropical resort to "reboot". They learn that they must compete against each other to hold onto this newly-found slice of paradise.
plot_es: Six men and six women who are unhappy with their lives arrive at an exclusive tropical resort to "reboot". They learn that they must compete against each other to hold onto this newly-found slice of paradise.
title: Escape Club
